title: Home
welcomeText:
# MEASA DeFi

The traditional financial system has generated massive wealth in the hand of those who make use of financial centres. This has created major disparity and inequality in global wealth.

![MEASA DeFi](/images/uploads/820x360pix.png "MEASA DeFi")

\
**We bring a Regulated Decentralised Finance (DeFi) ecosystem designed for the MEASA (Middle East, Africa and South Asia) region.**\
\
[\
**Read More About MEASA DeFi.**](https://modest-lovelace-76526a.netlify.com/admin)

# **Bringing MEASA X!**

### Rolling out our first product soon to start an ambitious journey!

Individual users can buy and sell cryptocurrencies using banks and cards.

Business users can receive payments for services/goods in cryptocurrencies and may ask us to settle with fiat money into bank accounts or kept in cryptocurrencies.

**[Read More](https://modest-lovelace-76526a.netlify.com/measax)**

### Join wait list to get timely updates.
